additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Pandoro [Wheat Flour, Egg, Sugar, Butterfat (16%) (Milk), Sourdough (Wheat Flour, Water), Milk, Fructose, Emulsifier (471), Cocoa Butter, Salt, Yeast, Natural Flavouring), Icing Sugar Sachet (5%) [Sugar, Wheat Starch].

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: Contains EGG, May Contain TREE NUTS, Contains CEREALS CONTAINING GLUTEN, Contains MILK, May Contain SOY

description: Our Pandoro is baked using a traditional family recipe passed down through the generations. The sweet and buttery panettone is hung upside down and cooled slowly over 8 hours. Indulge in the soft, delicate texture and finish at home with a dusting of icing sugar.
name: Pandoro
